item.description:
Let’s start the summer off with a picnic on the Sound in Guilford at Chaffinch Park! The park comes highly recommended and is easy to get to from 95.

This 22 acre park is a great place for fishing and picnics. The best parts are that it is beautiful, has tables and grills, a beach area as well as grass area, is free and parking is fairly ample.
Everyone can bring a dish to share, such as salads, chips, hot dogs, burgers, brownies, etc. Please post what you are bringing when you are RSVP so we don’t all arrive with the same thing

Feel free to bring family, friends and any items that you might things that you think could add to the fun such as:

• Frisbee
• Badminton/Volleyball equipment
• Cribbage/Cards
• Wiffleball
• Fishing Gear/Crab Nets


The event will be weather dependant!


http://www.lisrc.ucon...

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Start the Summer off with a Picnic/BBQ at the Beach!!!
